name: Krazy Kittens
description:
This game is a multiplayer game where you and your friend share the keyboard and play.

CONTROLS

1st Player Controls: Arrow Keys (Left and Right to move, Up to jump and down to go through floors)

2nd Player Controls: AWSD Keys (Left and Right to move, Up to jump and down to go through floors)

If one of you win or you two tie, reload the page to start another game.
